name: Neon Brood
description: Welcome to the virtual world of 80x with the dark atmosphere of neon streets and cyborgs waiting on every corner. Neon Brood is FPS of the old school, performed in the best traditions of games of this genre.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 600 MHz or higher processor Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 30 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
